DSE1.value: You've indicated you are Single, but another driver is listed as your Spouse. Please edit the relationships accordingly.

DSE2.value: You've indicated you're married.  Please add your spouse or edit the relationship of the person who is your spouse.

DSE3.value: You've indicated that you have two or more spouses or partners.  Please edit the relationships so only one remains.

DSE4.value: You've indicated you're in a partnership.  Please add your partner or edit the relationship of the person who is your partner.

DSE5.value: You've indicated you are Single, but another driver is listed as your Partner. Please edit the relationships accordingly.

DSE6.value: Drivers with a suspended, revoked, expired, or invalid license must be excluded from the quote by unchecking them.

DSE7.value: You've indicated you're separated. Please add your spouse or edit the relationship of the person who is your spouse.
